title: Destiny's Plaything (+Weird)
description: At the beginning of each mystery, roll +Weird to **see what is revealed about your immediate future**.

outcomes.text: The Keeper will reveal a useful detail about the coming mystery.
You get a vague hint about it.
something bad is going to happen to you.

title: I'm Here For A Reason
description: There's something you are destined to do. Work out the details with the Keeper, based on your fate. You cannot die until it comes to pass. If you die in play, then you must spend a Luck point. You will then, somehow, recover or be returned to life.  Once your task is done (or you use up all your Luck), all bets are off

title: The Big Entrance (+Cool)
description: When you make a showy entrance into a dangerous situation, roll +Cool.

outcomes.text: Everyone stops to watch and listen until you finish your opening speech.
You pick one person or monster to stop, watch and listen until you finish talking.
You're marked as the biggest threat by all enemies who are present.

submoves.title: Starting Moves
submoves.description: You **Destiny's Plaything**, **I'm Here For a Reason** and one more of your choice.

title: Devastating
description: When you inflict harm, you may inflict +1 harm.

title: Dutiful
description: When your fate rears its ugly head, and you act in accordance with any of your fate tags (either heroic or doom) then mark experience. If it's a heroic tag, take +1 forward.

title: Invincible
description: You always count as having 2-armour. This doesn't stack with other protection.

title: Resilience
description: You heal faster than normal people. Any time your harm gets healed, heal an extra point. Additionally, your wounds count as 1-harm less for the purpose of the Keeper's harm moves.

title: Improvement
pick: Take a move from another playbook (mark below)
Take a move from another playbook (mark below)

title: Advanced Improvements
description: After you have leveled up *five* times, you additionally qualify for advanced improvements.
pick: Get back one used Luck point
Change this hunter to a new type
Create a second hunter to play as well as this one
Mark two of the basic moves as advanced
Mark another two of the basic moves as advanced
Delete one of your Doom tags, and (optionally) one of your Heroic tags. You have changed that aspect of your destiny
